General.Name: Hubei Biocause Heilen Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hubei Biocause Heilen Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the pharmaceutical, chemical, and new energy fuel businesses in China. It provides APIs and intermediates, and formulations; and dimethyl ether gas and chloropropionyl chloride chemical products. The company is based in Jingmen, China.
